-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | minimal fork of io-reactive
--   
@package reactive-haskell
@version 0.0.1


-- | |
module Control.Concurrent.Reactive
type Action s = s -> IO s
type Request s a = s -> IO (s, a)
reactiveObjectIO :: state -> (ThreadId -> (forall r. Request state r -> IO r) -> (Action state -> IO ()) -> IO () -> object) -> IO object
type Sink a = a -> IO ()
pauseIO :: (a -> Sink b -> IO ()) -> a -> IO b
reactiveIO :: (a -> IO b) -> a -> Sink b -> IO ()
